proveit-add-reference-tooltip: Add a <ref> tag with a citation template inside
proveit-add-template-tooltip: Add a plain citation template (without a <ref> tag)
proveit-back-confirm: Your changes have not been copied to the page wikitext yet. Are you sure you want to leave?
proveit-reuse-tooltip: Insert a reference to this reference in some other part of the wikitext
proveit-normalize-tooltip: Normalize the spacing of all the references and templates
proveit-reference-name-warning: This reference has one or more reuses and/or subreferences. Deleting the name will unlink them.
proveit-reference-name-required: Enter a name to reuse this reference.
proveit-generate-tooltip: Enter a URL, DOI, ISBN, PMC/PMID or a well-formed plain-text citation in the content field and then click this button to try to generate the citation template automatically.
proveit-generate-fail: A citation could not be generated from the given content.
proveit-remove-confirm: This will also remove all reuses and subreferences of this reference. Ok?
proveit-archive-tooltip: Get the latest archived URL from the Wayback Machine
proveit-archive-success: Please test the archived URL before using it: $1
proveit-normalize-date-tooltip: Normalize the date according to this wiki's standards
